column5: HUSA Not worried about the daily any more as long as WTI is above 53 Every QTRLY ER is either added MONEY LAND or WELLS PROFITABLE

HUSA Well yesterdays BSU post doesnt seem to have the correct url for the viewabledownloadable files This one ought to fix that NB In this case its the shorts file and intraday trade summary spreadshett that MAY interest some dropboxcomsh1hbp1hzfwr92

HUSA I dont hink I ever mentioned this before Note the flags burst basket and basket idx These represent trades thast are part of a basket order that trades a lot of stocks with one order submission ETFs and indexes These have an effect on the trade much larger than us peons ever will and should be considered through their effect on HUSA as indicative of general markets sentiments and HUSAspecific price action MAY be and likely IS IMO collateral damage Confirmation of this thesis MAY reside in the fact that USO is also down big today
HUSA looks ready surprised on that news didnt take us to 35
HUSA On man we are above Yuma Ready for the new well to be put on sales In about 2 weeks
